meanings.definition: A member of a collective farm in the former Soviet Union.
meanings.sent1: The kolkhozniki worked together on the farm.
meanings.sent2: Many kolkhozniki lived in the same village.
meanings.sent3: The kolkhozniki decided to have a dance party in the fields.
meanings.sent4: The unity among the kolkhozniki was like a strong bond holding them together.
meanings.sent5: The kolkhozniki's dedication to their collective farm was unwavering.

meanings.sent1: We saw a group of kolkhozniki walking to the market.
meanings.sent2: The kolkhozniki gathered to discuss their harvest.
meanings.sent3: The kolkhozniki found a creative way to transport their produce.
meanings.sent4: The fields were filled with the laughter of the kolkhozniki.
meanings.sent5: The kolkhozniki's hard work paid off with a bountiful harvest.
